text: neohoedeul jung-e anaeleul namgigo imjonghaneun janeun anaeleul wihae yueon eul hago ilnyeongan anaeneun nagaji anihago buyang-eul badnola man-il geu nyeodeul-i seuseulo tteonageona ttoneun seu seuloleul wihae dodeog-e eogeusnaji anh neun il-eul handa haedo joeag-i anigeoneul hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungman hasim-ila
